page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: { Kingsdown}is a small coastal village situated on the southern tip of the North Downs in Kent.It is in a rural area surrounded by farms and fields.The main road runs through Ringwould to Dover and Deal. The Goodwin Sands are just off the beach .The chalk cliffs start at the Rifle Range.There is also the Walmer,Kingsdown golf club.There was a life-boat until 1927.The village has five shops and three pubs.Kingsdown and Ringwould are surrounded by farms ,there is a pig farm and a dairy farm.The school is on the main road at Ringwould.Ripple down house,is a study centre for London school children._There is also a scout camp where cubs,scouts and guides from all over the country meet.Kingsdown is mainly a village where commuters live.
